title: Nina Cosy Faux Fur Cap
description: Peak cosy, the Nina Cap gives street style a fluffy infusion. Wrapped in soft faux fur for extra warmth and wow.

title: Velvet Vibe 'Perfect Fit' Cap
description: A pop of luxe for your look, the Velvet Vibe Cap is soft to touch, easy to wear and smooth as butter. Dress it down, glam it up, make it you.

title: Soft Rinse Denim Bucket
description: The bucket hat of your denim dreams — soft, comfy, adventure ready. Whether playing in the sun or dancing in the rain, do it in your denim. Made from 100% cotton with UPF 50 protection and a 54cm fit.

title: Bleu Sol Bucket
description: The bucket hat of your denim dreams — soft, comfy, adventure ready. Whether playing in the sun or dancing in the rain, do it in your denim.

title: Dusty Threads Denim Cap
description: Flair comes in frayed edges. This dark-wash denim cap is made for those who colour outside the lines — fun, fearless, and one of a kind, just like you. Crafted from 100% cotton with UPF 50 protection and a comfortable fit, it’s finished with a frayed edge detail that brings attitude to every look.

title: Flower Power One
description: A little bloom, a lot of boom! This set of three flower charms in cream, pink and orange adds the perfect dose of wow to your wheels. Clip on and let your shoes do the walking and talking.

title: Flower Power Two
description: Step into good vibes only. These green, blue and lilac flower charms are made for colourful souls and playful strolls. Your own perfectly portable flowerbed.

title: Classic Shoelaces
description: Classic, bold, and ready for anything. These black-and-white laces bring instant cool to your kicks — a vibe that never goes out of style.

collections.title: Shoelaces
collections.description: Tie your look together your way. From bold colours to sparkling statements, UBU laces are made to mix, match, and make every step stand out. Whether you’re keeping it classic in black and white, brightening the day with sunny hues, or turning heads with shimmer and sparkle, these laces are little switches that bring big personality. One swap, endless style.

title: Shoelaces
description: Soft, sweet, and a little dreamy. Lilac laces add a touch of calm cool to your kicks — subtle but never boring.

description: Loud, proud, and pink-powered. These laces bring the boldest splash of fun to every step.

title: Shoelaces
description: Blue skies at your feet. Royal Blue laces keep your look fresh, clean, and cool without even trying.

title: Berry Cosmic
description: A dash of sparkle and a splash of magic, this set brings big bold vibes and very berry energy.

title: Roll With It
description: Follow your heart and roll with it! This set celebrates big feelings, bold moves and dancing to the beat of your own drum.

variants.title: Default Title
variants.sku: Follow your heart and roll with it! This set celebrates big feelings, bold moves and dancing to the beat of your own drum.

title: Glitter Vibes — Winky Face
description: Wink if you’re winning. Made for mischief, hijinx and shenanigans, a charm to pair with cheeky genes.

collections.title: Bag Charms
collections.description: Clip on some fun and carry your vibe everywhere you go. UBU bag charms are fluffy, sparkly, cheeky little sidekicks that turn any bag into a statement. From puffs and plushies to glitter, fruit, and wild creatures, each charm brings its own energy — playful, bold, or totally sweet. Swap them, stack them, mix them up — because your bag should be as full of personality as you are.

title: Glitter Vibes — Sunnies
description: Sparkly, smiley, bright and beautiful. Come to think of it, this charm is a lot like you. Clip it to your bag and beam bright.

title: Lipsmacker
description: Pucker up! This glossy little number brings maximum sass with zero apologies — made to turn heads, blow kisses and steal the show.

title: Starry Magic
description: Oh my starry-eyed surprise! Dipped in glitter and sprinkled with stardust, this charm brings cosmic confidence to every adventure.

title: Crystal vibes
description: Show your shoes a whole lotta love. These cute accoutrements are for those who wear their hearts on their laces.

title: Purrfect Pop
description: A sassy trio of shiny shoe charms = fun and flair for your footwear.

title: Electric Peel
description: Electrify your look with a set of high-voltage charms. Fashion sparks start to fly when you roll into a room with these.

title: Nina Capybara
description: Famously chill, capybaras carry a no-drama-lama vibe that wins friends everywhere. With Nina by your side, cruise into each day with confidence, calm and capybara cool.

With black-and-white sneaker-style laces, a pop-orange bungee ring, and a smiley-faced tag that always brings the good vibes, this charm brings courtside energy to your everyday carry. Finished with a mini basketball and that classic UBU twist—because style should always play hard.

description: Wild things wander free — just like you. These charms bring forest flair and fearless fun to every footstep.

title: Love Bomb
description: A little love goes a long way, and this one goes all out. Loud, proud and cherry red, this heart-shaped charm is a daily love letter to your laces — and yourself.

title: Eye Spy Two
description: Classic sunnies with floral flair. These bold, playful frames add a little drama to your OOTD.

title: Eye Spy One
description: Sunnies for honeys, these cute round frames will turn heads, block rays, and serve mini-style all day.

title: Eye Spy Three
description: Sunnies for honeys, these cute round frames will turn heads, block rays, and serve mini-style all day.

title: Pearl Pinlet
description: Quietly chic, endlessly versatile. This pearly pin was made to glow on hats, bags, belts or whatever you’re wearing today — your style, your rules.

title: Hair Pins
description: Hold it down, your way. These hairpins keep your look locked while adding a subtle edge. Sleek, lightweight, and built to play nice with any style — from messy buns to sharp braids. Small details that make a big difference. A pop of playful edge. The Purple Hairpins add bold accents to everyday looks — flashes of colour that say effortless fun.

title: Hair Pins
description: Hold it down, your way. These hairpins keep your look locked while adding a subtle edge. Sleek, lightweight, and built to play nice with any style — from messy buns to sharp braids. title: Beady Hair Bands
description: Style that holds and shines. These beady hair bands keep your hair secure while doubling as statement accents. Strong stretch meets playful beads — perfect for ponytails, braids, or stacking on your wrist when not in use. Built to last, made to stand out.
